oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of the stands at Pitt Stadium during Colonel Charles A. Lindbergh's visit to Pittsburgh. Lindbergh flew to Pittsburgh from Cleveland, Ohio in a two and a half hour flight.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: cataloging in progress
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Pittsburgh City Photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Pittsburgh City Photographer Collection, 1901-2002, AIS.1971.05, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lindbergh at Pitt Stadium
